This art generator creates unique images based on text prompts. Forget about the struggles of hiking through the web in search of the image or the tools you would need to make your own design. All you need to do is to describe your idea; AI Art will take care of the rest!

► Turn words into art
Want to see a BBQ party on Mars or a group of cats having a tea ceremony? Or maybe you're wondering what lies in the far corners of our universe? AI Art can show you all that and more!

► Explore art styles
AI Art has mastered a variety of art styles and techniques: from cartoonish pencil sketches to mind-blowing photorealism. Experiment with styles and see which one captures your idea best.

Take your selfies to the next level using AI magic. Upload your photos to generate your portraits in various settings, eras, and styles. Try on the roles of an epic comic-style superhero, a cool cyborg from the future, a 90s rock star, and more.

From beautiful illustrations and graphic layouts to striking logos and lettering, you can do it all with Vectornator’s powerful tools and features. Our iPadOS app is optimized for iPad Pro and Apple Pencil, and we also support third party styluses. The iOS version is touch-friendly, allowing you to draw from your phone with your finger tips. And for those who prefer to design on a desktop, the macOS app is perfect for working with a drawing tablet, or a keyboard and mouse. With iCloud sync, your documents will sync across all devices, allowing you to design anywhere, at any time.
 
POWERFUL VECTOR TOOLS
- Create pinpoint Bézier curves with our Pen Tool. You can edit the direction and angle of your paths with the Node Tool.
- Paint fluid vector shapes with our pressure-sensitive, customizable Brush Tool.
- Turn any raster image into vector paths in one tap using Auto Trace. This feature comes with three modes for different use cases – Sketch, Photography, and Illustration.
- Draw geometric shapes, such as rectangles, circles, and polygons, with the Shape Tool.
- Sculpt complex illustrations and logos from combined shapes using the Shape Builder.
- Use advanced vector tools such as corner radius, Boolean operations, and outlining paths.
- Add beautiful fonts with our Text Tool. You’ll have control over line height, kerning, and tracking. 
 
MODERN INTERFACE
- Our Layers Tab features fully-editable nested groups, so you can organize your designs with ease. 
- The Inspector Tab lets you view and edit the properties of your selected objects, layers, and artboards.
- Work with multiple artboards in a single document for an optimal UI and Web design experience.
 
COLORS AND GRADIENTS
- Our Color Picker supports gradients, palettes, hex codes, HSB, RGB, color blending, and wide color gamut.
- Import color palettes from third-party tools, or create a new palette from a photo. 
 
CONVENIENT SHORTCUTS
- The Quick Actions Bar takes the most useful tools and options and puts them below your selected object, significantly speeding up your workflow. 
- Intuitive gesture controls allow you to move around your canvas, undo or redo an action, clear, copy, paste, control tools, and find useful menus at your fingertips.
- Keyboard shortcuts allow you to design quickly and efficiently. 
 
TOTAL CONTROL
- Insert values using sliders or achieve even more precision with a keypad. 
- Move your objects point-by-point with our built-in Joystick controls.
- Easily align, group, mask, order, scale, rotate, duplicate, or delete your objects.
 
POWERFUL ADD-ONS
- Iconator is home to a vast library of over 80,000 royalty-free icons for you to use in your designs. 
- Our Unsplash integration gives you access to over 1 million royalty-free, high-resolution images.
- Use Fontinator to express yourself with endless fonts.
- In-app Camera Scanner for quickly photographing and importing sketches into Vectornator. 
 
MULTI FILE SUPPORT
- Import or drag and drop files directly into Vectornator (JPEG, PNG, TIFF, HEIC, PDF, SVG, Sketch, Figma, and AI).
- Export and share your creations in raster and vector file formats (JPG, PNG, PDF, SVG, and AI). 
- Capture and export your creative process with time-lapse videos.

Synchronize watermarks across all devices

Your templates will be synchronized between all your devices. Watermarks that you applied to photos at least once are added to the list of the 10 recently used templates. This list gets synchronized automatically, and you can access it whether you are on your phone or computer.  For instance, you design and apply a watermark in our app.  Then you open Watermarkly in Safari on your Mac and see the same watermark on the list of recently used templates. Protect your photos

Unfortunately, in our day and age, it is very easy and not time-consuming for somebody to download your photo and pose it as their own. Image theft happens on social media more often than you think. Moreover, there have been a few cases of well-known brands stealing a small creator’s photo or painting from their account and using it as a print on their clothes. This way, the artists got neither money nor credit for their work. Watermarks can help to prevent your images from being stolen. Place your name or logo on them to claim your copyright. 


Promote your works

Watermarks can be great not only for protecting your photos but also for getting your name out there. Internet is a peculiar thing; you never know where your images might end up. Even if you post your works on your Instagram account, there is a chance that your potential client might see them in a community on another social media platform with no link to your profile.
